title: 2018 Wild Card Weekend Preview
itunes:title: 2018 Wild Card Weekend Preview
description:
In a room filled with heroes – Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Marc Sessler and Chris Wesseling – react to a rowdy upcoming Wild Card Weekend [if the bozos ever start] (6:00)! Will the frisky Colts led by Capt. Luck terminate the Texans’ season (6:30), which offensive line will withstand Dallas’ and Seattle’s monster defensive fronts (16:40), can Rivers round the Chargers into deep playoff shape by bouncing the dynamic Lamar Jackson-led Ravens (24:30) and lastly, Da Bears, The Team of ATL, have a chance to dethrone the reigning NFL champions, but can Nick Foles muster more post season magic (35:00)?!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
